snippet: Approaching the Statue of Liberty by boat for the first time in 1999, Wang Qingsong had visions of Botticelli. “It was just a little bit like ’The Birth of Venus,’” he said. ‘‘It was a goddess born from the water.’’
lead_paragraph: Approaching the Statue of Liberty by boat for the first time in 1999, Wang Qingsong had visions of Botticelli. “It was just a little bit like ’The Birth of Venus,’” he said. ‘‘It was a goddess born from the water.’’
